name: PickUpItem
description: Pick up an item from the environment and add it to your inventory.
usage: Use this action when you want to take an item and carry it with you.

parameters.name: item_name
parameters.description: The name of the item to pick up

requirements: Item must be nearby and interactable
Item must be included in the available interactable entities
Must have space in inventory or hands
whenToUse: Need to carry an item with you
Need to take something to another location
Want to store items for later use
